author.persName: Mir Khwand (Muhammad b. Khawand Shah b. Mahmud).

msItem.title: Raudat al-Safa. Vol. VI.
msItem.note: Folio 1, recto; In Persian: a) Note of purchase dated 1332, next to impression of small oval seal, partly cut off. b) Note of possession by Muhammad Isma'il son of Hajji Jahangir, dated 30th year of 'Alamgir, 1098. In English: a) Signature of Jno Romer b) Presented to the Royal Asiatic Society by John Romer Esq Folio 1, verso: impression of round seal of Jamal al-Din 'Uthmani ... , dated 1107? Part of the same work as Codrington/Reade No 29. Illuminated initial opening. Ruled margins. Rubricated headings and punctuation.

listBibl.bibl: For Romer's gift see the Journal for 1837, p. xiv. For the provenance see Donations Register for November 18 1848.

bindingDesc.p: Red leather Oriental binding with stamped and painted decoration.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
